context.innerContext: An Imperial Star Destroyer captures a Rebel Cruiser.
context.innerPoint: Princess Leia loads secret data into R2D2.
context.innerClimax: Leia captured, R2D2 & C-3PO blast off in an escape pod.
context.innerDenouement: R2 & 3PO's escape pod careens toward Tatooine.

catalyst.innerContext: Droids captured by Jawas, sold to Uncle Owen and Luke.
catalyst.innerCatalyst: While cleaning R2, Luke sees Leia's plea for help.
catalyst.innerPoint: "Ben" Kenobi rescues Luke and tells him of the Jedi Knights.
catalyst.innerDenouement: Luke refuses Obi Wan's offer to accompany him to Alderaan.

point.innerContext: Luke discovers his home and family destroyed.
point.innerCatalyst: Luke & Obi-Wan meet Han & Chewbacca. They escape towards Alderaan.
point.innerPoint: The Death Star destroys Alderaan, captures the Millennium Falcon.
point.innerClimax: Luke, Han and Chewbacca rescue Leia. Obi-Wan sacrifices himself.
point.innerDenouement: The group escapes to a rebel base on Yavin IV.

climax.innerContext: The Rebels discuss the Death Star's hidden weakness.
climax.innerCatalyst: Luke joins the rogue squadron in an X-Wing starfighter.
climax.innerPoint: The Rebels suffer heavy losses. Only Luke is left to take the final shot.
climax.innerClimax: Obi Wan: "use the Force, Luke!" Luke destroys the Death Star. Kaboom!
climax.innerDenouement: Luke and Han fly back to Yavin IV.

denouement.innerContext: Back on Yavin IV, the trumpets blare.
denouement.innerCatalyst: Luke, Han and Chewbacca enter the throne room.
denouement.innerPoint: Leia awards Luke and Han medals of honor.
denouement.innerClimax: Our heroes turn and accept the applause of the rebels.
